--R--
Color - Frequency - Huffman Representation - Total Bits 
240 - 271154 - 0 - 271154 // 1 bit * 271154
32 - 110325 - 10 - 220650 // 2 bits * 110325
223 - 10219 - 110 - 30657 // 3 bits * 10219
255 - 162 - 111 - 486 // 3 bits * 162
*Total =  522947 // 271154 + 220650 + 30657 + 486 bits

--G--
240 - 271154 - 0 - 271154
0 - 68702 - 10 - 137404
112 - 41623 - 110 - 124869
208 - 10219 - 1110 - 40876
255 - 162 - 1111 - 648
*Total = 574951

--B--
240 - 271154 - 0 - 271154
112 - 68702 - 10 - 137404
16 - 41623 - 110 - 124869
49 - 10219 - 1110 - 40876
255 - 162 - 1111 - 648
*Total = 574951

**Compression Output**
